title: Remember the baby that had it toes chewed on by the pit bull puppy? Whatever happened to the baby, parents and puppy?
text:
This
story took place in Jacksonville, which is outside our normal coverage
area, so we haven't been actively following this story. We ran a
short item from the Associated Press at the time, but it's outside
the area we primarily focus on in New Hanover, Brunswick and Pender
counties.
